summary: Content Calendar feature fully tested. Fixed critical bug in backend stats API (datetime comparison error). All backend endpoints working (10/10 tests passed). Frontend UI verified - calendar page loads, stats display correctly, Create Event dialog works, Use Template dialog shows all 8 templates, List view displays events in table format.

minor.issue: Was returning 500 error due to comparing offset-naive and offset-aware datetimes
minor.fix: Added timezone awareness to scheduled dates before comparison in get_calendar_stats function

issues: MUI Grid deprecation warnings for 'item', 'xs', 'sm' props - should update to Grid v2 API (minor, non-blocking)

critical_code_review_comments: Content Calendar page uses proper data-testid attributes for testing
All API endpoints correctly protected with admin authentication
Calendar stats correctly calculate upcoming events and overdue items
Templates endpoint returns 8 predefined templates for quick event creation
List view displays all event details with type, status, priority, and region chips
seed_data_creation: Created 2 test events during testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Content Calendar feature fully functional. Backend API endpoints tested: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /events, GET /stats, GET /templates, GET /upcoming. Frontend features tested: Stats cards, calendar grid view, list view, month navigation, Create Event dialog, Use Template dialog. Bug fixed in stats API (datetime timezone handling).

backend_endpoints.notes: Deletes event and returns 404 on subsequent GET
Returns upcoming events for next N days

frontend_features.feature: Stats cards display (Total Events, This Week, Overdue, Completed)
Create Event dialog with form fields
List view displays events in table

bugs_fixed.issue: TypeError: can't compare offset-naive and offset-aware datetimes in get_calendar_stats
bugs_fixed.fix: Added timezone awareness check: if scheduled.tzinfo is None: scheduled = scheduled.replace(tzinfo=timezone.utc)
